title: Strictly's Katya Jones laughs off claims she gave Catherine Tyldesley a 'dirty look'
text:
Strictly Come Dancing pro Katya Jones has laughed off a fan's recent claims that she gave star Catherine Tyldesley a 'dirty look' during Saturday's live show.

The dancer, 30, took to Instagram to share a snap of her stoney expression behind Catherine, with the playful caption: 'You make me laugh people.'

It comes as Katya ended up in the dance-off on Sunday with breakfast presenter Mike Bushell, 53, after the pair struggled to impress the panel with a lacklustre samba.

Scroll down for video

Hilarious: Strictly Come Dancing pro Katya Jones has laughed off a fan's recent claims that she gave star Catherine Tyldesley a 'dirty look' during Saturday's live show

During Saturday's show, Katya could be seen standing behind Catherine after she headed up the balcony with professional partner Johannes Radebe.

The soap star had just performed a Tango, while Katya was yet to perform her dance, and the dancing duo earned a solid 28 points out of 40.

As Catherine reflected on the routine, Katya's unimpressed face could be seen staring towards the camera, and it did not go unnoticed by one viewer.

They tweeted: 'I'm not sure if Katya was dishing Catherine Tyldesley a dirty look then or it's just her resting b**** face.'

Awkward! The dancer could be seen with a stoney expression behind actress Catherine, following her performance in Saturday's live shows

Hilarious: The blunder was spotted by one eagle-eyed fan, but Katya laughed it off on social media

Stellar: Catherine had just performed a respectable tango with pro Johannes Radebe, while Katya was yet to perform

But Katya laughed off the claims by taking to Instagram Stories, as she re-posted a viewer shared of her expression which was captioned: 'oh ya mrs_katjones your on telly hen.'

She then wrote: 'You make me laugh people!'

Katya took to the Strictly dancefloor on Saturday with partner Mike, but failed to impress the judges with their samba.

After finishing second-bottom of the leaderboard, the pair ended up in the dance-off with goalkeeper David James, who was sadly eliminated by the judges.

Sensational: On Saturday Katya was in the dance-off with breakfast presenter Mike Bushell, but the pair were saved by the judges

Low-key: Meanwhile front-runner pro Oti Mabuse were spotted arriving for another day of rehearsals on Wednesday with her husband Marius Lepure

Relaxed: Emmerdale star Kelvin Fletcher cut a casual figure in a grey t-shirt as he headed into another day of training

Meanwhile front-runners Kelvin Fletcher and Oti Mabuse were spotted arriving for another day of rehearsals on Wednesday.

The Emmerdale star displayed his ripped physique in a casual grey t-shirt which poked fun at his Northern roots with the phrase 'Fear Naught.'

His partner Oti was wrapped up in a pale pink furry coat as she arrived with her husband Marius Lepure.

Strictly Come Dancing airs on Saturday at 6:35pm on BBC One.

Wrapped up; Oti was warm and cosy in a pale pink furry coat as she headed in practice to teach Kelvin another dance
description: The dancer, 30, took to Instagram to share a snap of her unimpressed expression behind Catherine, with the playful caption: 'You make me laugh people.'
